title: 9/21/21: Roe vs Wade, Stock Market Tanks, Debt Ceiling Battle, Maskless SF Mayor, Obesity Crisis, Natural Immunity, SALT Tax, Drug Prices, and More!

itunes:title: 9/21/21: Roe vs Wade, Stock Market Tanks, Debt Ceiling Battle, Maskless SF Mayor, Obesity Crisis, Natural Immunity, SALT Tax, Drug Prices, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar talk about the future of Roe vs Wade, why the stock market is tanking, the looming debt ceiling fight in congress, SF Mayor caught maskless violating her own guidelines, America's childhood obesity crisis worsening, the debate around natural immunity, Democrats' tax policy, congressional gridlock with David Sirota, and more!
